label: Postal and Delivery Services
description: Services related to sending and receiving packages and mail.

subcategories.label: Domestic Parcel Delivery
subcategories.description: Delivery of packages within the same country.

subcategories.label: International Parcel Delivery
subcategories.description: Delivery of packages to other countries.

subcategories.label: PO Boxes and Mail Forwarding
subcategories.description: Services related to receiving mail at a different address.

subcategories.label: Office and Business Services
subcategories.description: Services related to office and business needs.

subcategories.label: Christmas and Seasonal Jobs
subcategories.description: Temporary jobs related to the holiday season.
